page.title: 19A Typical Family Weekend.
page.content: We practiced for our Anniversary which was to take place in the afternoon.My brother spent the day at a friend's house,while Dad went out working again.Mum and Gilian did a little work on the farm.At lunch time,we had a traditional Sunday dinner. In the afternoon,my mother and I went to the Anniversary at the Chapel. I sang in the choir,and also sang a solo.It was only a small Chapel but it was full for the Anniversary,which is always popular. Later in the day we had a walk around our farm and then visited some friends about 4 miles away."
